concept.title: Group Tool
concept.shortdesc: The group tool can group items together, or ungroup them.

section.p: If more than one item is selected, then clicking this tool will group the items together. This will basically create a new g element and add the selected elements to be children of the new group. This means that the new group can be moved or resized with the children being relative to the group
If only one item is selected and it is a group, then the group will be removed and the children of the group will be added to the root node of the XML document.
Both of these actions can be accessed via the canvas popup menu.
